Source.name: EBS Sensor: FIN AP Unaccounted accounting event having event date in closed period - Weekly
Source.DisplayName: EBS Sensor: FIN AP Unaccounted accounting event having event date in closed period - Weekly
Source.Description: Check with unaccounted payment accounting event having event date in closed period.

DBPattern.SQLQuery: select 'ME$EBS_FIN_AP_UNACCOUNTED_EVENTS_W_EVENTDATESINCLOSEDPERIODS' sensor, to_timestamp(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') entrytime, 'check_id:' || s.check_id key_data FROM (SELECT /*+ ordered use_nl(gps, xte, xe) */ ac.check_id check_id FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ph.check_id FROM apps.ap_payment_history_all ph WHERE ph.accounting_date BETWEEN ( trunc(sysdate) - 7 ) AND ( trunc(sysdate) + 3 ) ) chks, apps.ap_checks_all ac, apps.ap_system_parameters_all asp, apps.gl_period_statuses gps, apps.xla_transaction_entities_upg xte, apps.xla_events xe WHERE xe.application_id = 200 AND xte.application_id = 200 AND xe.entity_id = xte.entity_id AND xte.ledger_id = asp.set_of_books_id AND xe.event_status_code IN ( 'I', 'U' ) AND xe.process_status_code IN ( 'I', 'U', 'R' ) AND asp.org_id = ac.org_id AND gps.application_id = 200 AND gps.set_of_books_id = asp.set_of_books_id AND trunc(xe.event_date) BETWEEN gps.start_date AND gps.end_date AND gps.closing_status NOT IN ( 'O', 'F' ) AND nvl(gps.adjustment_period_flag, 'N') = 'N' AND xte.entity_code = 'AP_PAYMENTS' AND ac.check_id = nvl(xte.source_id_int_1, - 99) AND ac.check_id = chks.check_id AND ROWNUM < 11 ORDER BY check_id) s
